entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse. I ordered it a couple weeks ago and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. I'm happy to help you with that. Can you please provide your order number so I can locate your purchase?
Ugh, one sec... Okay, it's VF7892345.
Thank you. Let me pull that up... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse you purchased on July 26th. What seems to be the problem?
The pulse tracking is completely off. It's wildly inaccurate! I'm working out and it says my heart rate is barely elevated. It's useless! I want to return it.

I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with the VeloBand Pulse. According to our return policy, you have 90 days to return items for a full refund. Since you just got the VeloBand Pulse, you are well within that time frame. Can you please provide your reason for returning the smart watch?
I already told you! It doesn't work properly! The pulse reader is garbage. Just process the return! This is taking way too long.

I apologize for the delay. I completely understand your frustration. I've processed the return for the VeloBand Pulse. You should receive a pre-paid shipping label in your email within the next 24 hours. Simply repackage the device and drop it off at the nearest carrier location. Once it's received at our warehouse, your refund will be processed.
Finally! So I just print the label, slap it on the box, and drop it off? And I'll get my money back?
That's correct. The refund will be credited back to your original method of payment. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.
Okay, great! Thanks for your help. I appreciate it.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a wonderful day! Thank you for choosing VeloFit.
